title: Temp banned after I came back from a 4 week vacation
body:
I honestly don't know what the reasons are for my ban... I don't know what to say really other than. What happend RITO?

EDIT: I also forgot to mention that I NEVER received an E-Mail with "aditional details" and yes I looked everywhere. I did not get an email from riot games or league of legends on my account email. with the reason of my ban.

replies.body: Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can go over everything with you there. There's not really a whole lot I can do from here on the boards, but those account agents will be able to go over everything about your account there.
Same here, however my ban was perm. Never used third party software or anything. Just a perm ban with no email or anything saying why. Trying to figure out what's going on now.
